text:
@DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive Really?
By conducting exams at this time, that too given the option of "offline", with thousands of students traveling to their colleges at other states at this point of time through major hubs like airports.
Winning against #COVID19 for India isn't possible.
#cancelexams
